A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Full of badly timed cringey comedy\, obvious toy-selling CGI things. Lots of weird moments and a running time that's at least 30 minutes too long. A plot that somewhat interestingly subverts every expectation to the sequel\, but is full of holes and leads nowhere interesting\, while at the same time almost standing still while the movie  is running.

Not really recommended\, but Star Wars fanatics will say this is great and critics have obviosuly been bought out by Disney. 

And no\, I don't think that Star Wars should be all serious and that the good old movies are the best thing ever. This movie just doesn't pull off comedy as anything but a complete deflation of any scene that might have had emotional impact.
